name: Kittypocalypse - Ungoggled
description: Kittypocalypse is an in-depth, strategic tower defense game. Across a diverse range of environments, defeat the hordes of evil alien kitties and salvage what's left of your home planet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 11 compatible GFX card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 900 series or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun game, could use some hours trying to stop those little furballs. It is a very casual game, take your time and enjoy.
